en.title: Missions Shop

skipMapMission.name: Mission skipper
skipMapMission.info: Allows you to skip a mission obtained on the map, however, you will not get any reward.
skipMapMission.giveTitle: {pseudo}, you have decided to skip a mission

money.name: King's Money
money.info: Based on the current gem prices and after deducting the king's tax, you will receive `{amount}` :moneybag:.

valuableItem.name: King's Treasure
valuableItem.info: Grants you a valuable item from the king's treasure room.

1000Points.name: King's Fervor
1000Points.info: Grants you 1000 points. Can only be used once a week.
1000Points.giveDescription: You have received 1000 :medal:. See you next week for a new fervor!

lovePointsValue.name: King's court vet
lovePointsValue.info: Get detailed information about your pet.

1: seems to hate you. Be careful, or you might get a bad rap on your adventures!
seems to really dislike you. Considering how you take care of your pet, it's not a surprise!
seems to be in deep trouble. You should try feeding your pet.
2: still looks wild. Take care of your pet to gain its trust!
seems not to like you. If you don't take care of your pet, you'll never get its love!
doesn't seem happy. You should try to feed your pet.
3: still seems a bit fearful. Take care of your pet so that you can gain its full trust!
still seems to be wary of you. Continue to take care of your pet in order to get its love!
seems to be getting used to you. Try to be regular in feeding your pet.
4: seems to like you. Continue to take care of your pet to gain its full trust!
seems to trust you. If you continue on this path, you will soon get all the love from your pet!
seems to have grown on you. Don't stop being regular to feed your pet.
5: Seems to like you completely. You don't even have to take care of your pet anymore to keep it loving you!
seems to share a strong bond with you. Your bond is unbreakable, so long as you are not separated, you will continue to enjoy your pet's love!
